---
title: "Analysis"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(foreign)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Read in data

```{r}
data <- inner_join(
  read.dbf('../fullshpfile/shapefile/holc_ad_data.dbf'),
  fromJSON('../data/means.json'),
  by = c('neighborho' = 'id')
) %>% 
  rename(vegetation = mean)
```

## Visualize data

```{r}
data %>% ggplot(aes(vegetation)) +
  geom_density() +
  facet_wrap(~ holc_grade)
```
